Actually I don=E2=80=99t have a copy of the retail release, so I don=E2=80=
=99t know the differences, so I=E2=80=99ll play 15 minutes of the game, and=
 you see if you notice any differences.   I don=E2=80=99t know whether I sh=
ould commentate the control scheme and other feel throughs, or whether I sh=
ould let the games sounds speak for themselves.  I would twitch it, except =
for 3 factors, 1) I don=E2=80=99t have much bandwidth, for a 480i outbound =
video, even if I use all 400 k out, 2) My xbox won=E2=80=99t let me twitch =
out through the HDMI IN port, and 3) the computer is very far away from the=
 CRT TV and is a Macintosh, and I don=E2=80=99t know how to twitch out with=
 a Macintosh and a Hauppauge Rocket.

Some advice about how to share this?
=

> On Nov 21, 2016, at 3:22 PM, Paul Thacker lennier_of_the_minbari@yahoo.c=
om [ballyalley] <ballyalley@yahoogroups.com> wrote:
> 
> Neat! That could b=
e a prototype. Can you tell if it's any different than the retail release?
=
> 
> 
> Paul
> 
> Sent from Yahoo Mail on Android <https://overview.mail.ya=
hoo.com/mobile/?.src=3DAndroid>
>  
> Brian Ciesicki wrote:
> >>
> It was a=
 local chain in the east-side suburbs of Cleveland known as Captain Video. =
 [...] That was the first time I was exposed to the Astrocade.
> >>
> 
> I =
loved your description of how you first approached the Astrocade's controll=
er!
> 
> >>
> Also one of my cartridges looks like a sample cartridge wth a=
 message saying sample belongs to Jack Nieman.  Is Jack Nieman involved in =
any way with Bally/Astrocade?
> >>
> 
> Wow, very cool! Jack Nieman was Bal=
ly's national sales manager in the 1970s. Paul and I have mentioned him a f=
ew times on recent episodes of the Astrocast podcast because Jack was often=
 named in people's letters to the Arcadian (and in the Arcadian itself).
> =

> I just did a search of the Bob Fabris Collection. I have a short note to=
 Bob from Jack from September 1978. I also have a letter that Bob wrote to =
Jack in 1980.
> 
> Adam
> 
> 
> 


--Apple-Mail=_692018C3-A763-430F-A2EB-9D7EB33E0F37
